triples.name: Modal logic
triples.relevance: The paper introduces a modal language with new semantics for dependence.

triples.name: Game theory
triples.relevance: The paper employs game-theoretic definitions to define semantics for the modal language.

triples.name: Semantics (logic)
triples.relevance: The paper develops multiple semantic definitions (game-theoretic and inductive) for the modal language.

triples.name: Dependence logic
triples.relevance: The paper introduces a novel modal language incorporating dependence logic principles.
